en: You can go out on condition that you come home by seven.
zh: 只要你7点前回家，你就可以出去。

en: By 7:00 she will have eaten dinner.
zh: 到7点的时候，她肯定已经吃完晚饭了。

en: I have to be there by 7:00.
zh: 我得在7点前赶到那儿。

en: I have to be back home by seven.
zh: 我必须在7点前回家。

en: Please come to the lobby by 7 o'clock.
zh: 请在7点前到大厅。

en: Can I hang out here till seven?
zh: 我能在这儿呆到7点吗？

en: Please wait until seven, when she will come back.
zh: 请等到7点，她到时候就回来了。

en: I saw it after the seven o'clock news.
zh: 我是看完7点新闻之后看到的。

en: She went to bed, having set the alarm for seven.
zh: 她定了7点的闹钟，然后就睡了。

en: I'll call you at seven.
zh: 我7点给你打电话。

en: See that you are ready to leave like that.
zh: 确保你准备好就这样出发。

en: I want you to wait for me until I get through with work at 7.
zh: 我想让你等我到7点下班。

en: I got up at seven.
zh: 我7点起床的。

en: Could you give me a wake-up call at seven?
zh: 能在7点给我打个叫醒电话吗？

en: I will be waiting for the bus at seven.
zh: 我7点的时候会在那儿等公交车。

en: See you at 7.
zh: 7点见。

en: I will call for you at seven.
zh: 我7点去接你。

en: Don't fail to be here at 7 o'clock sharp.
zh: 7点整一定要到这儿，别迟到。

en: Please call me up between seven and eight.
zh: 请在7点到8点之间给我打电话。

en: I'll be back by seven or eight o'clock.
zh: 我7、8点钟左右回来。

en: Please call me at about 7:30.
zh: 请在7点半左右给我打电话。

en: My seven-year-old niece said to her brother "I'll tell on you."
zh: 我那7岁的侄女对她哥哥说：“我要去告你的状。”

en: The weather is usually hot in July.
zh: 7月的天气通常很热。

en: I wonder if the first week or so of July is too early to go to the beach.
zh: 我在想7月的第一周左右去海边会不会太早了。

en: Industrial production in July rose sharply.
zh: 7月份的工业产值大幅增长。

en: One day in July, we went to the sea.
zh: 7月的某一天，我们去了海边。

en: The Star Festival is in July.
zh: 七夕节在7月。

en: It's cool today for July.
zh: 对于7月来说，今天挺凉快的。

en: July 4th is a red-letter day in America.
zh: 7月4号是美国的一个重要节日。

en: Thank you for your letter of July 25 and the fabric sample.
zh: 谢谢你7月25号的来信，还有寄过来的面料样品。

en: With regard to your letter of July 22nd, I enclose our most recent catalogue.
zh: 关于你7月22号的那封信，我随信附上了我们最新的产品手册。

en: I'm taking a vacation from July 20 through August 8.
zh: 我从7月20号到8月8号要休假。

en: I will start working on July first.
zh: 我7月1号开始上班。

en: Would you please pick me up at the hotel on Friday July 11th at 10:00 a.m.?
zh: 麻烦你7月11号周五早上10点来酒店接我一下，行吗？

en: I received your letter of July 10.
zh: 我收到你7月10号的那封信了。

en: We'll pay you on demand any day after July 10th.
zh: 7月10号之后的任何时间，只要你有需要，我们随时付款。

en: On July 10, we will open our Sapporo branch.
zh: 7月10号，我们的札幌分店就要开业了。

en: Have you got a seven-yen stamp?
zh: 你这儿有7日元的邮票吗？

en: Seven is believed to be a lucky number.
zh: 大家都觉得7是个幸运数字。

en: Seven is a lucky number.
zh: 7是个幸运数字。

en: Seven is said to be a lucky number.
zh: 听说7是个挺吉利的数字。

en: Seven is sometimes considered a lucky number.
zh: 有时候人们觉得7是个幸运数字。

en: Seven dollars, please.
zh: 一共是7美元。

en: That's $7.65, please.
zh: 一共是7.65美元，谢谢。

en: What are the seven seas?
zh: “七大洋”是指哪几个海？

en: The top leaders of seven countries attended the meeting.
zh: 七个国家的首脑参加了这次会议。

en: Seventy or eighty years is the normal span of a man's life.
zh: 活个七八十岁也算是人的正常寿命了。

en: For a man of seventy, he still has surprising vigour.
zh: 对于一个70岁的人来说，他的精力还真是旺盛得惊人。

en: The seventy-year-old man kept his twenty-year-old wife at home all the time; he had a dog-in-the-manger attitude.
zh: 那个七十岁的老头老是把二十岁的老婆关在家里，简直是占着茅坑不拉屎。

en: I missed school for six days.
zh: 我有六天没去上学了。

en: The average of 7, 10, and 16 is 11.
zh: 7、10和16的平均数是11。

en: In the 6th century, the Anglo-Saxons adopted Roman characters.
zh: 在公元6世纪，盎格鲁-撒克逊人开始使用罗马字母。

en: We need accommodation for six.
zh: 我们需要六个人的住处。

en: It's no easy matter to maintain a family of six.
zh: 养活一家六口人可不是件容易事。

en: Six professors constitute the committee.
zh: 委员会由六位教授组成。

en: Six members constitute the committee.
zh: 这个委员会一共有六名成员。

en: One-third of the six members were women.
zh: 那六个成员里，有三分之一是女性。

en: A half-dozen tools make up the tool collection.
zh: 这套工具里一共有六件。

en: Come home by 6:30.
zh: 六点半之前记得回家。

en: Dinner will be ready by six-thirty.
zh: 晚饭六点半左右就能做好。

en: It'll arrive in Chicago at 6:30.
zh: 六点半就能到芝加哥了。

en: I want to catch the six o'clock train to New York.
zh: 我想赶六点去纽约的那班火车。

en: You should come home before six.
zh: 你应该在六点前回家。

en: Got up at six, and left home at seven.
zh: 我六点起床，七点就出门了。

en: After six hours' climbing, we finally succeeded in reaching the top of the mountain.
zh: 爬了六个钟头，我们总算爬到山顶了。

en: The medicine has to be taken every six hours.
zh: 这药得每隔六小时吃一次。

en: Take this medicine every six hours.
zh: 这药你每六个小时吃一回。

en: Any time will do so long as it is after six.
zh: 只要是六点以后，什么时间都行。

en: After 6 p.m. the employees began to disappear.
zh: 过了下午六点，员工们就陆陆续续走光了。

en: Let's wait until six o'clock.
zh: 我们等到六点再说吧。

en: Wait till six.
zh: 等到六点吧。

en: I cannot start till six o'clock.
zh: 我得等到六点才能开始。

en: I must have it done somehow by six.
zh: 无论如何，我六点前得把这事儿办完。

en: I'll be waiting for Tom until 6 o'clock.
zh: 我会一直等汤姆等到六点。

en: We're all booked up at 6:00.
zh: 我们六点钟已经全订满了。

en: My plane leaves at six o'clock.
zh: 我的飞机是六点钟的。

en: Can we still catch the 6:00 Shinkansen?
zh: 我们还赶得上六点那班新干线吗？

en: My airport shuttle bus leaves at six o'clock.
zh: 我去机场的班车六点发车。

en: If we are to be there at six, we will have to start now.
zh: 要想六点赶到那儿，咱们现在就得动身了。

en: I don't mind leaving at six o'clock.
zh: 六点走我没问题。

en: Let's meet at Shibuya Station at six.
zh: 咱们六点在涩谷站碰头吧。

en: I'll pick up the photographs at six o'clock.
zh: 我六点去取照片。

en: Please wake me at six.
zh: 请六点叫醒我。

en: I don't mind getting up at six.
zh: 六点起床我无所谓。

en: Come home before six.
zh: 六点前回家。

en: Please pick me up at the hotel at six o'clock.
zh: 请六点到酒店接我。

en: I'll call for you at six.
zh: 我六点去接你。

en: I have an appointment with him at six.
zh: 我和他约了六点见。

en: I'd like to reserve a table for four at six.
zh: 我想预订六点四个人的位子。

en: Six o'clock will suit me very well.
zh: 六点对我来说挺合适的。

en: Will six o'clock suit you?
zh: 六点你方便吗？

en: I will pick you up around six.
zh: 我六点左右去接你。

en: I got up at about six.
zh: 我大概六点起的床。

en: I've been waiting since six o'clock and still my turn hasn't come.
zh: 我从六点等到现在，还没轮到我。

en: Please give him a dose of medicine every six hours.
zh: 请每隔六小时给他吃一次药。

en: Children of six and above should attend school.
zh: 六岁及以上的孩子应该上学。

en: From about age 6, I led the life of a latchkey kid.
zh: 从大概六岁起，我就过上了“挂钥匙儿童”的生活。

en: June is the month when we have a lot of rain.
zh: 六月雨水很多。

en: We have many rainy days in June.
zh: 六月里有很多雨天。

en: It rains a lot in June.
zh: 六月经常下雨。

en: It is a cold morning for June.
zh: 就六月来说，今天早上挺冷的。

en: What time is convenient for you on June seventh?
zh: 六月七号你什么时候方便？

en: I'd like to reserve a single room on June 3.
zh: 我想预订六月三号的一个单人间。

en: I'd like to cancel my appointment for June first.
zh: 我想取消六月一号的预约。

en: Here is the final agenda for the meeting on June 16.
zh: 这是六月十六号会议的最终议程。

en: He counts up to six.
zh: 他能数到六。

en: Yeah, I asked about six times.
zh: 是啊，我问了大概六遍。

en: I am six feet tall.
zh: 我身高六英尺。

en: Add six and four and you have ten.
zh: 六加四等于十。

en: Six high-tech companies set up branch offices in that prefecture.
zh: 六家高科技公司在那个县设立了办事处。

en: I have expected his death for six months.
zh: 我对他的去世已经有六个月的心理准备了。

en: Six months later we were married.
zh: 六个月后我们结婚了。

en: After a six month period, his leg was healed and is normal again.
zh: 过了六个月，他的腿好了，恢复正常了。

en: Six months is a long time to wait.
zh: 六个月等起来可真够久的。

en: I haven't bought a pair of shoes for six months; I deserve a new pair so I think I'll go buy them!
zh: 我都半年没买鞋了，该奖励自己一双了，我打算去买。

en: People of 65 and above get a pension from the government.
zh: 六五岁及以上的人可以领政府养老金。

en: Americans who are over sixty-five make up 12.5% of the total population.
zh: 六十五岁以上的美国人占总人口的百分之十二点五。

en: Six hundred and forty-four ... and she went to sleep.
zh: 六百四十四……然后她就睡着了。

en: I took the 61 bus.
zh: 我坐了61路公交车。

en: What do you have to add to 17 to get 60?
zh: 17加多少等于60？

en: Thank you for letting me know that the Model 600-J printer will not be available until May 4, 1997.
zh: 谢谢告知 600-J 型打印机要到1997年5月4日才有货。

en: No fewer than fifty thousand people visited there.
zh: 去那里参观的人不下五万。

en: We had hardly waited for five minutes when the bus came.
zh: 我们等了还不到五分钟，车就来了。

en: My bag was here five minutes ago, but it is gone now.
zh: 我包五分钟前还在呢，现在不见了。

en: Five minutes' walk brought us to the park.
zh: 走个五分钟就到公园了。

en: We had already walked five minutes when were caught in a shower.
zh: 我们才走了五分钟就遇上阵雨了。

en: Go down the street for about five minutes, and you will see the department store to the right.
zh: 沿着这条街走大概五分钟，就能看到右边的百货公司了。

en: I had not run five minutes when I got out of breath.
zh: 我跑了还不到五分钟就喘不过气了。

en: I will be back in less than five minutes.
zh: 我五分钟之内就回来。

en: Please wait for five minutes.
zh: 请等五分钟。

en: I have five copies, but I need twice as many.
zh: 我有五份，但我需要双倍。

en: Take any train on track 5.
zh: 坐5号站台的任何一趟车就行。

en: I'd like to get off at Fifth Avenue.
zh: 我想在第五大道下车。

en: You should take the number 5 bus.
zh: 你应该坐5路车。

en: How do I get to Gate 5?
zh: 5号门怎么走？

en: In about the fifth year I decided cutting the grass was something I didn't want to do any more of.
zh: 大概到第五年的时候，我决定再也不想除草了。

en: At the beginning of the fifth year, Tony said he was going to have to charge more.
zh: 第五年年初的时候，托尼说他得涨价了。

en: Five years is too long to wait.
zh: 等五年太久了。

en: I had retinal detachment five years ago.
zh: 我五年前视网膜脱落过。

en: I agreed to her suggestion that we meet again five years from then.
zh: 我同意了她的建议，五年后再见。

en: It's because he lived in the United States for five years.
zh: 因为他在美国住了五年。

en: I saw Yoshida for the first time in five years.
zh: 我时隔五年又见到了吉田。

en: Throughout the five years of painful cancer treatments, he managed to keep a stiff upper lip.
zh: 在长达五年的痛苦癌症治疗中，他一直表现得非常坚强。

en: Give me five days.
zh: 给我五天时间。

en: It rained five successive days.
zh: 连着下了五天雨。

en: We should be able to complete the work in five days.
zh: 我们应该能在五天内完成这项工作。

en: Five fire engines rushed to the scene of the fire.
zh: 五辆消防车冲向了火灾现场。

en: Five thousand yen is enough to buy this dictionary.
zh: 五千日元买这本字典够了。

en: Five thousand dollars is a large sum of money.
zh: 五千美元可是一大笔钱。

en: Five pitchers are to take the mound in rotation.
zh: 五名投手将轮流上场。

en: Five prisoners were recaptured, but three others are still at large.
zh: 五个逃犯被抓回来了，但还有三个在逃。

en: It will not be long before one out of five people owns a car.
zh: 很快每五个人里就会有一个人有车了。

en: I have an appointment with him for five-thirty.
zh: 我约了他五点半见面。

en: We must begin before five.
zh: 我们必须在五点前开始。

en: I'll call you around five o'clock.
zh: 我五点左右给你打电话。

en: In case you go out before 5, just let me know.
zh: 万一你五点前要出去，跟我说一声。

en: You must be here by five.
zh: 你五点前必须到这儿。

en: You are free to go anytime, as long as you get back by five.
zh: 你随时可以走，只要在五点前回来就行。

en: He can go out on condition he comes home by five.
zh: 他可以出去，但条件是必须在五点前回家。

en: Be sure to come here by five.
zh: 务必在五点前到这儿。

en: You may go on condition that you return by five.
zh: 你可以去，但得在五点前回来。

en: Don't fail to come here by five.
zh: 一定要在五点前过来。

en: He'll be back by five o'clock.
zh: 他五点前会回来的。

en: I'd like to get home by five.
zh: 我想在五点前到家。

en: Do you think it impossible to finish the task before five?
zh: 你觉得五点前不可能完成任务吗？

en: I want to finish this work by five.
zh: 我想在五点前把活儿干完。

en: Please wait till five, when he'll be back.
zh: 请等到五点吧，那时候他就回来了。

en: I am to meet him at five at the station.
zh: 我五点要在车站见他。

en: Could you arrange to be here at five?
zh: 你能安排在五点到这儿吗？

en: Would you please call me up at five o'clock?
zh: 能请你在五点钟给我打个电话吗？

en: There is no admission fee for children under five.
zh: 五岁以下儿童免票。

en: I wanted to be a bus driver when I was five.
zh: 我五岁的时候想当个公交车司机。

en: May comes after April.
zh: 四月之后是五月。

en: In May the trees have fresh leaves.
zh: 五月的时候，树木都长出了嫩叶。

en: It's even very cold in May.
zh: 五月甚至还挺冷的。

en: The doctor can see you at ten on May seventh.
zh: 医生可以在5月7号10点给你看诊。

en: The 5th May is Children's Day.
zh: 5月5号是儿童节。

en: I want to make a reservation for JAL flight one to Tokyo on May 12.
zh: 我想预订5月12号飞往东京的日航1号班机。

en: Would you please meet me at Yaesu central gate of Tokyo Station on Monday, May 10th at 3:00 p.m.?
zh: 请问能约在5月10号周一下午3点在东京站的八重洲中央口见面吗？

en: Please cancel my reservation on JAL flight two to New York on May 10.
zh: 请帮我取消5月10号日航2号去纽约的订位。

en: Take the elevator to the fifth floor.
zh: 坐电梯到五楼。

en: Five miles is a long distance to walk.
zh: 走五英里路可是挺长一段距离。

en: Five miles is a suitable distance for a picnic.
zh: 去野餐的话，五英里的路程挺合适的。

en: Do you have a five-pound note?
zh: 你有五英镑的纸币吗？

en: Can I borrow five pounds from you?
zh: 能借我五英镑吗？

en: 5 is less than 8.
zh: 5比8小。

en: Four times five is twenty.
zh: 四五二十。

en: Here's $5.
zh: 给，这是五块钱。

en: 5 dollars in quarters and a dollar in dimes.
zh: 五块钱的25分硬币和一块钱的10分硬币。

en: I have little more than 5 dollars.
zh: 我身上也就比五块钱多一点点。

en: Add 5 and 2, and you get 7.
zh: 5加2等于7。

en: He died aged 54 years.
zh: 他去世的时候54岁。

en: Where are the bags from Flight 57?
zh: 57号航班的行李在哪领？

en: You have a personal tax exemption of 500,000 yen.
zh: 你有50万日元的个人免税额度。

en: Compared to fifty years ago, today's aviation technology has made great progress.
zh: 跟五十年前相比，现在的航空技术有了巨大的进步。

en: Fifty years ago anyone could have bought the land.
zh: 五十年前，谁都能买下这块地。

en: This is the hottest summer we have had in fifty years.
zh: 这是五十年来最热的一个夏天。

en: You gave me only fifty cents.
zh: 你才给了我五毛钱。

en: No fewer than 50 passengers were killed.
zh: 至少有50名乘客遇难。

en: No less than fifty passengers were injured in the traffic accident.
zh: 这场交通事故中至少有50名乘客受伤。

en: As many as fifty students gathered to hear his lecture.
zh: 有多达50名学生聚在一起听他的讲座。

en: There were 20 failures among 50 applicants.
zh: 50个申请人里有20个没通过。

en: He must be over fifty.
zh: 他肯定有五十多岁了。

en: Write in less than 50 words.
zh: 写在50个字以内。

en: It's 50 yen.
zh: 是50日元。

en: Follow the street for about 50 meters, and you will see a post office.
zh: 沿着这条街走大约50米，就能看到一个邮局。

en: I'd like to borrow fifty dollars from you.
zh: 我想找你借五十块钱。

en: Are you able to grant us a special discount of 5% for 50 sets of the product?
zh: 如果我们买50套，能给我们打个九五折吗？

en: I was late, so I missed flight 501.
zh: 我迟到了，没赶上501号航班。

en: There were as many as five hundred people present.
zh: 当时足足有五百人在场。

en: No fewer than five hundred students were present.
zh: 至少有五百名学生在场。

en: 500 policemen were put on strict alert.
zh: 500名警察进入了严密警戒状态。

en: Can you lend me 500 yen?
zh: 能借我500日元吗？

en: Can you sell the book to me for 500 yen?
zh: 你能把这本书500日元卖给我吗？

en: Five hundred dollars is a small sum for him.
zh: 五百美元对他来说就是笔小钱。

en: I have about 5,000 yen.
zh: 我身上大概有5000日元。

en: We'd like a deposit of $50.
zh: 我们需要收50美元的押金。

en: It is easy to add 5 to 10.
zh: 10加5算起来很简单。

en: I walked three-fourths of a mile.
zh: 我走了四分之三英里。

en: For four years, he cut the grass at the original price, but I noticed that toward the end of that year, he had a helper with him quite often.
zh: 四年来他一直按原价割草，但我发现那年快结束的时候，他经常带着个帮手。

en: I haven't heard a word from them in over four years.

en: Four boys amused themselves playing cards.
zh: 四个男孩在打牌消遣。

en: Four boys are making their way along the street.
zh: 四个男孩正沿着街道往前走。

en: She rented a four-room flat.

en: The fourth period was moved up to the third.

en: Take this medicine every four hours.
zh: 这药每四小时吃一次。

en: Could you keep my bags here until four?
zh: 能帮我把包存到四点吗？

en: I will help you if I have finished my work by four.
zh: 如果我四点前忙完，我就去帮你。

en: He wouldn't be available until four.

en: I am leaving at four.

en: At four we could go home.

en: April is the fourth month of the year.

en: Many kinds of flowers come out in the middle of April.

en: The birthstone of April is diamond.

en: You must return the book by the end of April.

en: Our rates increased in April.

en: In April we have a lot of school events.
zh: 四月份我们学校活动挺多的。

en: The cold weather extended into April.
zh: 寒冷的天气一直持续到了四月。

en: It's rather cold for April.

en: Public utility charges will go up next April.
zh: 明年四月公共事业费要涨价了。

en: The salary will be raised from April.

en: There's to be a strike on April 6th.

en: We suggest April 6 as a date for your visit.

en: I'd like to meet you either on the morning of April 5 or on the afternoon of April 6.
zh: 我想在四月五号上午或者六号下午见您。

en: Would you please arrange to meet with me either on the morning of April 5 or 6?
zh: 能麻烦安排在四月五号或六号上午见个面吗？

en: Would it be possible to set up a meeting with us on April 5 or 6?
zh: 四月五号或者六号能跟我们开个会吗？

en: On April 1, Nanyo Foods Co. Ltd. will move to its new building in Yokohama.
zh: 四月一号，南洋食品公司会搬到横滨的新大楼。

en: Four multiplied by two is eight.

en: Having failed four times, he didn't try anymore.

en: You can make 4, 6 or 12 payments.

en: Four hundred million people speak English as their first language.

en: By the time we had walked four miles, he was exhausted.

en: Four miles is a good distance.

en: I'd like to buy two 45-cent stamps, please.
zh: 我想买两张四十五美分的邮票。

en: It will cost you 45 cents.
zh: 这要花你四十五美分。

en: Please transfer 450 dollars to my account.
zh: 请往我账户里转四百五十美元。

en: Please put me through to 442-5511.
It's in front of a restaurant on 42nd street.
zh: 就在四十二街的一家餐馆前面。

en: The following is what he started to think, as he made his way to room 418.

en: 400,000 gallons of oil have spilled out of the pipeline.

en: We ordered 40 minutes ago.

en: Forty years passed.

en: I got out of the car at 40th Street.

en: A man shouldn't be a pastor until he's in his forties.

en: The class of forty includes eighteen girls.

en: It was not until he was forty that he began to study German.

en: He must be nearly forty.

en: Run in the 40 meters.

en: Forty miles is a good distance.
zh: 四十英里可挺远的。

en: Bear in mind that half one's life is lived after forty.
zh: 记住，人的一生有一半是在四十岁以后度过的。

en: You need not write more than 400 words.
zh: 你不用写超过四百个字。

en: More than 40 percent of the students go to university.
zh: 超过百分之四十的学生上了大学。

en: No less than 40 percent of students go on to university.
zh: 至少有百分之四十的学生上了大学。

en: Take three steps and jump.

en: Do you know the reason why two-thirds of the students did not attend the student meeting?

en: Will you notify me after 3 minutes?
zh: 过三分钟你能提醒我一下吗？

en: The third star belonged to a certain king.

en: The age of the carpet is a third thing to consider.

en: Three years is a long time, I feel.

en: After three straight late nights at work, I feel like I'm drowning in work.

en: It rained three days on end.

en: Please come in three days.

en: It has rained for three days on end.

en: He stayed there for three days.

en: I will answer within three days.

en: Let's make it about a three-day trip.

en: The reply came after three days.

en: We lost by a score of three to one.

en: He's beating me, three to zip.

en: Three ships were given to him by the queen.

en: Even three centuries ago, most Western Europeans still used their fingers.

en: A gang of three robbed the bank in broad daylight.

en: All three hated one another.

en: Three Chinese students were admitted to the college.

en: There were three men.

en: Three boys climbed the trees like a bunch of monkeys.

en: Three children were playing in the park.

en: Three children sat on the sofa.

en: While one of them sped around major parts of the property on the mower, a second made a few sweeps at some tall weeds on the edge of my wife's garden, and the third got into the truck and smoked a cigarette.
zh: 一个人开着割草机在院子里飞快地转悠，第二个人在老婆花园边上割了几下高处的杂草，第三个人则钻进卡车里抽起了烟。

en: Who runs the fastest of the three?
zh: 他们三个里谁跑得最快？

en: I am the oldest of the three.

en: Of the three boys, the youngest is the most attractive.

en: This meal is adequate for three.

en: Three people are still missing.

en: After spending three weeks looking for a job, he found a well-paid one.

en: The weather stayed cold for three weeks.

en: Who has been absent from school for three weeks?

en: We have French third period.

en: After three hours of discussion we got nowhere.
zh: 讨论了三个小时，还是没什么结果。

en: It began to rain heavily more than three hours ago.
zh: 三个多小时前就开始下大雨了。

en: Can you extend my stay until three o'clock?

en: Please wait until 3:00. She'll be back then.

en: I expect him to be here by three.

en: Let's have tea at 3:00.

en: Call her up at three.

en: Let's make it three.

en: I'll call for you at three.

en: I can come at three.

en: I would greatly appreciate it if we could change our appointment to 3:00 pm on March 6.

en: March 3 is the day of the Dolls' Festival.

en: We feel that March 1 would be more convenient.

en: It has been announced that railway fares will be raised by 10 percent starting on the first of March.

en: March 15 will be my last day of school.

en: Please reconfirm the reservation by March 10.

en: The sum of all the angles in a triangle equals 180 degrees.

en: I threw up three times.

en: If you add three to four, you get seven.

en: 3 to the third power is 27.

en: After three months, he got used to the life in the town.

en: I will have spent all this money in three months.

en: Because a new commodity is announced, it is in good supply every three months.

en: It will be three months before our new school building is completed.

en: It is difficult to speak three languages.

en: The closest I have is a 38.

en: For 381 days, the buses of Montgomery travelled back and forth on their routes, almost empty.
zh: 蒙哥马利的公交车在那381天里空荡荡地往返行驶。

en: May I borrow a duplicate key for Room 360?

en: I received your Model 345 in good condition.

en: How do I get to Gate 33?

en: Take it to the men in Room 318.
zh: 把这个给318房间的那几个人送去。

en: The car broke down after half an hour's driving.

en: You should have left half an hour earlier.

en: You ought to have started half an hour ago.

en: Please come back after half an hour.

en: I'll be over in half an hour.

en: I was kept waiting for nearly half an hour.

en: Go on running for thirty minutes.

en: You have to come back in 30 minutes.

en: If I have to wait 30 minutes, I'll order later.

en: It took half an hour.

en: Let's break off for half an hour and have some coffee.

en: Given only thirty minutes, we couldn't answer all the questions.

en: I run to the toilet every thirty minutes.

en: Count up to thirty.

en: Let's begin at page 30.

en: Could you bring my breakfast to room 305?
zh: 能把我的早餐送到305房间吗？

en: For three hundred years they have farmed the surrounding land.
zh: 三百年来，他们一直在这一带种地。

en: You are covered with a $300 deductible.

en: Over three thousand people attended the concert.

en: You should stay in bed for three or four days.

en: If you agree to buy 3000 of them, we'll give you a 3 percent discount.

en: Twenty thousand yen, please.

en: I'd like two prints of each.

en: Two stockings are called a pair of stockings.

en: I couldn't drink both bottles, so I left one for you.

en: The two streets run parallel to one another.

en: The two roads cut across the street from us.

en: The two streets intersect at right angles.

en: Advance two steps.

en: I want to rent an apartment with two rooms.

en: I have two dogs. One is white and the other black.

en: Both dogs are asleep.

en: If you run after two hares, you will catch neither.

en: The second sentence was just as long.

en: Do I take the second street on the left?

en: They're in aisle two.

en: Don't ever do that kind of thing again.

zh: 我还没走一分钟就碰到他了。

en: He missed the train by a minute.
zh: 他晚了一分钟，没赶上火车。

en: I had hardly waited a minute when he came.
zh: 我刚等了不到一分钟他就来了。

en: We can ill afford to lose a minute.
zh: 我们一分钟也耽误不起。

en: Because just one minute costs nearly four pounds.
zh: 因为仅仅一分钟就要花掉将近四英镑。

en: It's only six pence per second.
zh: 一秒钟只要六便士。

en: The house was empty except for a cat.
zh: 屋里除了只猫什么都没有。

en: A grasshopper and many ants lived in a field.
zh: 田里住着一只蚱蜢和许多蚂蚁。

en: A cat appeared from behind the curtain.
zh: 窗帘后面钻出一只猫。

en: A dog is running in the park.
zh: 有只狗在公园里跑。

en: Could you please put me up for the night?
zh: 能让我借宿一晚吗？

en: I'd like two singles for three nights from the 21st for about sixty dollars a night.
zh: 我想订两间单人房，从21号起住三晚，价格每晚60美元左右。

en: We have a single for 50 dollars per night.
zh: 我们有一间单人房，每晚50美元。

en: I'd like a double for four nights from tonight for about fifty dollars a night.
zh: 我想订一间双人房，从今晚起住四晚，价格每晚50美元左右。

en: A cup of hot soup relaxed me.
zh: 喝了杯热汤，我感觉放松多了。

en: I would rather work for any company than waste another year.
zh: 我宁愿去随便哪家公司上班，也不想再荒废一年。

en: It is an exciting time of the year.
zh: 这是一年里最让人兴奋的时候。

en: Compared with the level of a year ago, the price is sharply lower.
zh: 跟一年前相比，价格跌了很多。

en: I wish he could have driven a car a year ago.
zh: 我要是他一年前就能开车就好了。

en: I have not heard from her for a year.
zh: 我已经一年没收到她的消息了。

en: In the course of a year my son grew stronger.
zh: 这一年下来，我儿子结实了不少。

en: I'll have you all speaking fluent English within a year.
zh: 我保证一年内让你们都能说一口流利的英语。

en: The first season of the year is spring.
zh: 一年的第一个季节是春天。

en: The weather changes very often at this time of year.
zh: 每年这个时候天气总是变来变去的。

en: There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, fall and winter.
zh: 一年有四个季节：春夏秋冬。

en: How many seasons are there in a year?
zh: 一年有几个季节？

en: A year has twelve months.
zh: 一年有十二个月。

en: I'll see to it that you have a raise after the first year.
zh: 满一年后，我会保证给你涨工资的。

en: A year had passed by and his body turned to dust.
zh: 一年过去了，他的身体已化为尘土。

en: I was feeling blue all day.
zh: 我一整天都觉得很郁闷。

en: I am dead tired from walking around all day.
zh: 走了一整天，我快累死了。

en: They were pretty tired after having worked all day.
zh: 干了一整天活，他们累坏了。

en: It has kept raining all day.
zh: 雨下了一整天。

en: He was playing tennis all day.
zh: 他打了一整天网球。

en: I've been working all day.
zh: 我干了一整天活。

en: I got tired of lying in bed all day.
zh: 整天躺在床上我都躺腻了。

en: We are gaining a day.
zh: 我们赚了一天时间。

en: It's impossible to do the sights of Tokyo in a day or two.
zh: 一两天是不可能逛完东京的。

en: There is always heavy traffic here at this time of the day.
zh: 每天这个时候这里总是堵车。

en: How many cruises are there each day?
zh: 每天有几趟游船？

en: Please be sure to take one dose three times a day.
zh: 请务必一天吃三次，一次一剂。

en: Take the medicine three times a day.
zh: 这药一天吃三次。

en: I cover twenty miles a day.
zh: 我一天走二十英里。

en: It is next to impossible to see Rome in a day.
zh: 想在一天内逛完罗马几乎是不可能的。

en: Do you have any day tours?
zh: 你们有一日游吗？

en: We have more apples than we could eat in a day.
zh: 苹果多得我们一天都吃不完。

en: At the end of every day, his back was tired and his legs hurt.
zh: 每天收工的时候，他都腰酸腿疼。

en: I go shopping every other day.
zh: 我每隔一天去逛一次街。

en: Be sure to take medicine three times a day.
zh: 记得药一天吃三次。

en: An elephant was hunted there.
zh: 那里有一头大象被猎杀了。

en: Do you think you can live on a dollar a day in America?
zh: 你觉得在美国每天靠一块钱能活吗？

en: It was Janet that won first prize.
zh: 得一等奖的是珍妮特。

en: A monster lay on a rock near the top of the mountain.
zh: 山顶附近的岩石上趴着一只怪物。

en: I've won first prize!
zh: 我拿了一等奖！

en: Little did she dream that she could win first prize.
zh: 她做梦也没想到自己能得一等奖。

en: Never did I dream of winning first prize.
zh: 我做梦都没敢想能拿一等奖。

en: Everybody fails once or twice.
zh: 谁都会有个一两次失败。

en: There is but one chance left.
zh: 只剩下一次机会了。

en: I must buy one.
zh: 我得买一个。

en: A car stopped at the entrance.
zh: 一辆车在入口处停了下来。

en: A truck was careering along the road.
zh: 一辆卡车在公路上飞驰。

en: A pair of gloves was left in the taxi.
zh: 有一副手套落在出租车里了。

en: He makes a religion of never wasting a penny.
zh: 他把不乱花一分钱当成了信条。

en: Ten million yen will be ample for the project.
zh: 一千万日元做这个项目绰绰有余。

en: A century is one hundred years.
zh: 一个世纪是一百年。

en: A boy was walking with his hands in his pockets.
zh: 一个男孩双手插兜走着。

en: One lives in Fukuoka, and the others live in Niigata.
zh: 一个住在福冈，其他的住在新潟。

en: One is Japanese and the other is Italian.
zh: 一个是日本人，另一个是意大利人。

en: One is in Kumamoto and the other in Tokyo.
zh: 一个在熊本，另一个在东京。

en: An old woman limped along the street.
zh: 一个老太太在街上一瘸一拐地走着。

en: An old lady guided us through the castle.
zh: 一位老太太领着我们参观了城堡。

en: A man stood waving his hand to me.
zh: 有个男人站在那儿冲我挥手。

en: A man appeared at the door.
zh: 门口出现了一个男人。

en: All but one was present.
zh: 除了一个人，其他人都到了。

en: A student was run over by a car on Basin Street.
zh: 一个学生在贝辛街被车撞了。

en: A passenger fainted, but the stewardess brought him around.
zh: 有个乘客晕倒了，但空姐把他弄醒了。

en: Only one little boy survived the traffic accident.
zh: 只有一个小男孩在那场车祸中幸存了下来。

en: A girl drowned in the pond yesterday.
zh: 昨天有个女孩在池塘里淹死了。

en: An ugly man knocked on my door.
zh: 一个长得很丑的男的敲了我的门。

en: A watchman sat with his legs crossed.
zh: 一个看门人翘着二郎腿坐着。

en: I would like to travel alone.
zh: 我想一个人去旅行。

en: Get on the bus one by one.
zh: 大家排队一个一个上车。

en: I have not had a bowel movement for a week.
zh: 我一个星期没大便了。

en: I feel completely restored after a week in the country.
zh: 在乡下待了一个星期，我觉得整个人都恢复过来了。

en: I plan to stay there a week.
zh: 我打算在那儿待一个星期。

en: I'll be staying here for a week.
zh: 我准备在这儿住一个星期。

en: It had been snowing for a week.
zh: 雪已经下了一个星期了。

en: Down fell the house a week later.
zh: 一个星期后，那房子塌了。

en: He got a hard box after a week.
zh: 一个星期后他收到了一个硬盒子。

en: It's been a week, but I'm still suffering from jet lag.
zh: 都一个星期了，我还在倒时差。

en: I'll call you within a week.
zh: 我会在一个星期之内给你打电话。

en: I made up my mind, then and there, that I would get the necessary million dollars within a week.
zh: 我当场就下定决心，一个星期之内一定要弄到所需的一百万美元。

en: The results will be back in a week.
zh: 结果一个星期后就能出来。

en: I've been waiting for you for over a week.
zh: 我都等你一个多星期了。

en: It kept on raining for a week.
zh: 雨连着下了一个星期。

en: I haven't had a square meal for a week.
zh: 我一个星期都没好好吃顿饭了。

en: I was allowed to take a week off.
zh: 我获准请了一个星期的假。

en: How often, in a week, do you take a bath?
zh: 你一个星期洗几次澡？

en: Let's get together here once a week.
zh: 咱们一个星期在这儿聚一次吧。

en: I can do it in a week.
zh: 我一个星期就能搞定。

en: I will get the work done in a week.
zh: 我会在一个星期内把活儿干完。

en: It is impossible to finish the report in a week.
zh: 一个星期内是不可能写完这份报告的。

en: Can you do without smoking for a week?
zh: 你能一个星期不抽烟吗？

en: It was a week before she got well.
zh: 过了一个星期她才痊愈。

en: The news turned out true in a week.
zh: 一个星期后，那条消息证明是真的。

en: I'll take three of each sort.
zh: 每种给我拿三个。

en: What do you have the first period?
zh: 你第一节是什么课？

en: The first class begins at 8:30.
zh: 第一节课八点半开始。

en: After walking for an hour, we stopped to take a rest.
zh: 走了一个小时后，我们停下来休息了一会儿。

en: He left an hour ago.
zh: 他一个小时前走了。

en: The man who telephoned an hour ago was Frank.
zh: 一个小时前打电话的那个人是弗兰克。

en: We will leave in an hour.
zh: 我们一个小时后出发。

en: I'll call you up again in an hour.
zh: 我一个小时后再给你打电话。

en: I'll be back in an hour.
zh: 我一个小时后回来。

en: We'll arrive there within an hour.
zh: 我们一个小时内就能到那儿。

en: I've been looking for them for more than one hour.
zh: 我找他们找了一个多小时了。

en: He will be back in an hour.
zh: 他一个小时后就回来。

en: We've been driving in circles for an hour.
zh: 我们已经绕圈子开了一个小时了。
